channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass verges not been mowed this year., 7th May
item.description:
On the main Innsworth Lane alongside the houses of 1/4 Tern Court on Rookery Road. Innsworth. GL31AY. This area used to be cut by Tewkesbury borough council but as not been done this year at all. Spoken to them and I have been told it now comes under Gloucestershire Highways. There are 2 grass verges on this area that need cutting as it is very unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 156, Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path is still very unsafe, 7th May
item.description:
Between 12 and 8 80 yards of uneven patched up pathway Needs total resurfacing to make safe for people using mobility aids Been bad for several years
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chandos Drive, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th May
item.description:
Customer reports that two trees are causing subsidence O/S location and have damaged a nearby property. They request that the roots are killed off to prevent further damage.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th May
item.description:
Email received 06/05/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that a tree at the location is overhanging the Bus Shelter and has damaged a bus that has pulled up alongside it.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disintegrating road around manhole cover, 7th May
item.description:
This is one of many manhole cover in Finlay Way that need to be repaired and upgraded to meet the needs of the increase traffic and quantity of Heavy Duty lorries. "If a jobs worth doing its worth doing it well"

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
